title: 2013-14 patch (v1.0.0) for FIFA 11
description:
2013-14 patch (v1.0.0) for FIFA 11


features:
Tool "FIFA 11 Selector":
- improvements/fixes
- select arena stadium & ball
- select scoreboards
- winter options:
  * enable winter balls (= always use winterballs)
  * always use winter accesoires
  * set referee winter accesoire: (long shirt sleeves, with under armour     sleeves, ...) 

- squads: fixes & improvements
- Mini-faces: 25.800+ new mini faces
- shoes
  * generic ea shoes replaced (automaticly) by random shoes
  * new shoes + improvements
  * updated assignments 
  * fix: wrong shoes to some players: (ex. Ronaldo, isco, ...)
- scoreboards added: selection between 12 scoreboards 
- balls:
  * winter & snow balls 
  * new ball "Nike Incyte A-League": A-League 
  * new ball "Nike Incyte STSL": Turkish league (= Galatasaray)
  * ball "nike maxim cbf" linked to brazil league
- tattoos added: 
  * Puyol, Dani Alves, FÃƒÂ bregas, Adriano (barca), S Busquets, Tello, Pepe,     Marcelo, Di Maria, hamsik, Lavezzi, De Rossi
- kits: 
  * referee kits: different referee kits for each league
  * extra gk kits: for away/3th kits
- addboards: 
  * specific adboards for teams
- faces: 
  * some updates/improvements
  * new face: JesÃƒÂ© RodrÃƒÂ­guez (real Madrid)
- fix: crash at startup (after kaka screen)


- LANGUAGE:
all ingame languages updated

Supported languages english, Czech, dutch, french, german, italian, spanish (2X), portuguese, polish, Russian



Installation:
1. install fifa 11 
2. install ea patch (1.01)
3. install 2013-14 patch (v0.5) 
4. install 2013-14 patch (v1.0.0)


Notes:
- 2013-14 Patch v0.5 needed (later hotfixes are included at this 1.0.0 version)
- Arena lightning: when you select an arena stadium (with selector), you can change the lightning by switching to another stadium (ingame)


Problems:
- crashes, ...: use the "i68 regenerator" (select "take care of edited files..." > go , can take some time) 



pls leave your comments if there are any problems
